title: John Raftery amateur boxer
creator_credit: Steven Keller, Peter Katadotis and Jacques Bobet
brief_description: John Raftery, one of Canada’s boxing hopefuls for a gold medal at the Commonwealth Games at Edmonton in 1978 is seen training for the fight in his hometown and in the match for the gold medal at Edmonton
creator_credit_for_label: Steven Keller, Peter Katadotis and Jacques Bobet
